Bug 2694 Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press Add for the associated editors.

a. Enable multiple selection.

b. Set the default entry in the associated editors list as marked (default) (see perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

c. Need a width hint for the dialog.

d. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, and d.

Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, d, and g.
OB: The OK button is enabled even when no selection is made.
EB: The OK button should be disabled when no selection is made.
SR:
1. Launch the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Press the Add button.
3. Observe that the OK button is enabled without making any selection.

Expected Result:
The OK button should be disabled until a selection is made.
